nodes.text: Captain Archer of the Grand Army of the Republic lead a squadron in 19 BBY, in the aftermath of the Battle of Coruscant. It consisted of at least seven Aggressive ReConnaissance-170 and V-wing starfighters, flown by at least a few Clone trooper pilots. They were charged by the Senate Bureau of Intelligence with chasing the Stellar Envoy.
Archer's squadron appeared in Millennium Falcon by James Luceno.
